name: holidaygiftideas
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: holiday gift ideas
des: It’s often a headache to think of personalized and creative gifts for everyone on different holidays. The Alexa skill intends to offer unique holiday gift ideas to users based on their input on the holiday type and the person they are selecting gifts for.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
